v8:item.v8:content: External user list context menu standard commands
Show external users that belong to subgroups
Show users that belong to subgroups
User will be blocked from logging in after a specified date or period of inactivity.
User is not allowed to log in, or is not granted login rights or startup rights (thin client or web client).

Settings.QueryText: SELECT ExternalUsers.Ref AS Ref, ExternalUsers.Prepared AS Prepared, ExternalUsers.DeletionMark AS DeletionMark, ExternalUsers.Invalid AS Invalid, ExternalUsers.Predefined AS Predefined, ExternalUsers.Description AS Description, ExternalUsers.Comment AS Comment, VALUETYPE(ExternalUsers.AuthorizationObject) AS AuthorizationObjectType, -1 AS PictureNumber, CASE WHEN ExternalUsers.Invalid THEN FALSE WHEN ExternalUsers.IBUserID = &CurrentIBUserID THEN TRUE WHEN &CanChangeOwnPasswordOnly THEN FALSE WHEN ExternalUsers.IBUserID = &BlankUUID THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS CanChangePassword, ExternalUsers.IBUserID AS IBUserID, UsersInfo.* FROM Catalog.ExternalUsers AS ExternalUsers {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.UsersInfo AS UsersInfo ON (UsersInfo.User = ExternalUsers.Ref)} WHERE CASE WHEN &AllExternalUsers THEN TRUE WHEN &SelectHierarchy THEN TRUE IN (SELECT TRUE FROM InformationRegister.UserGroupCompositions AS UserGroupCompositions WHERE UserGroupCompositions.User = ExternalUsers.Ref AND UserGroupCompositions.UsersGroup = &ExternalUsersGroup) ELSE TRUE IN (SELECT TRUE FROM Catalog.ExternalUsersGroups.Content AS ExternalUserGroupsComposition WHERE ExternalUserGroupsComposition.ExternalUser = ExternalUsers.Ref AND ExternalUserGroupsComposition.Ref = &ExternalUsersGroup) END

SELECT ExternalUsersGroups.Ref, ExternalUsersGroups.DeletionMark, ExternalUsersGroups.Predefined, ExternalUsersGroups.Parent, ExternalUsersGroups.Description, CASE WHEN ExternalUsersGroups.DeletionMark THEN 8 ELSE 9 END AS PictureNumber, ExternalUsersGroups.AllAuthorizationObjects, ExternalUsersGroups.Comment FROM Catalog.ExternalUsersGroups AS ExternalUsersGroups

v8:item.v8:content: Show users that belong to subgroups
